channel.title: PaperMod on Tech Shinobi
channel.description: Recent content in PaperMod on Tech Shinobi

item.title: Little Things Behind This Website
item.description: This is my 2nd time using HUGO and hosting a site on Github Pages. It’s so convenient compare to self hosting. I don’t have to set up DDNS or CDN, also not have to patch up or update everything periodically to keep it secure. All the steps I have done are very similar to this article, except making the Personal Access Token and Custom Domain (these are easy to find separately).
